Kraken will help you understand more about your behavior, while enabling us to research new personal assitance methods.
You will be able to change these settings later.
For Kraken to work properly you need to activate the accessibility option. Therefore just open the Accessibility Settings via the Button and enable the Kraken.Me service.
You have to login first to use Kraken.

Kraken.me collects activity data and profile information in the context of research at the Technische Universität Darmstadt. Furthermore the data is used to offer services to you. Data is collected by the Kraken.me Android App, the Kraken.me Desktop Monitor and the Social Hub for connections to social networks. Based on the Kraken.me applications you use and your decision for a collection profile you decide which information is collected by the Kraken.me applications. Follow this link you find an overview of the data collected, grouped by application and collection profile.\n\nThe data collected by Kraken.me can be used for scientific research and for the visualization of information within Kraken.me applications which apply automated methods of data processing and analysis. We never use your data for commercial purpose. We reserve the right to hand over anonymized and aggregated subsets of the data to third parties.
This permission is crucial for program operation
